title: Classic Roy Masters DVD Lecture - Overcoming Self Doubt
description:
DVD lecture format. More than 2 hours long. Pretty good quality.


Overcoming Self Doubt is one of many DVDs from
the FHU's Classic DVD Collection. Each DVD is a
digitally remastered lecture of the original video, 
recorded live in Los Angeles during the early 1980's as
part of a public television broadcast series. All DVDs
contain unique insights and solutions into the
particular problems that each lecture addresses.


WWW.FHU.COM for more info

The Foundation of Human Understanding was founded by Roy Masters in 1963. It is dedicated to assisting all who are sincerely interested in perfecting their spiritual natures through a deeper understanding and application of Judeo-Christian principles. In the past five decades, the FHU has helped hundreds of thousands of people find freedom from fear, anger, depression, addictions and relationship problems of every sort.

Roy has been on the air for 49 years, listen to the radio show at fhu.com and watch his sunday conversations on his website or live sundays at 1:00pm eastern on ustream.tv
